thread.title: 'American Idol' Alum Kimberly Caldwell Delivers Baby Girl
thread.title_full: 'American Idol' Alum Kimberly Caldwell Delivers Baby Girl

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'American Idol' Alum Kimberly Caldwell Delivers Baby Girl
text:
Comments The 'Mess of You' singer welcomes baby Harlow Monroe Harvey, her first child with husband Jordan Harvey. 
Kimberly Caldwell can officially add mother to her resume. The " American Idol " alum gave birth to a bouncing baby girl on October 7. It's her first child with husband Jordan Harvey. The baby was born, "weighing in at a dainty but mighty 5.2 pounds and 18.5 inches long." The couple described the delivery "the most intense and rewarding day of our lives." They told Us Weekly , "We are so grateful to be gifted this perfect little addition into our family. Can't believe she's finally here and we can't keep our eyes off of her, especially when debating on whose nose she has. So many long nights, memories, and adventures to be made with this sweet little girl and looking forward to every minute." Kimberly and Jordan who tied the knot in December last year named their newborn daughter Harlow Monroe Harvey. She revealed the name five months ago on Instagram via a sonogram picture. She also gave a first look at the nursery last month. Sep 7, 2015 at 9:27am PDT
